trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Oxford
There were no other sightings in Oxford on or around November 28th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsGot up to get a drink of water. Looked up out window over sink, The bright lightcaught my eye.First thought it was the headlights of an airplane comming towardsus. wow, what the24 is that Called husband to view. Tried to anolize it . Could not. It washuge. It moved VERY SLOWly if at all. Seamed to hover. It kept changing shapeand color. Had no sound. Of course we were in the house, couldnt really tell ifthere was a sound. Started out round, got flat on left side. Then got flat ontop. Changed from white to red and back again. Had yellow green rim. Changedshape to Christmas bulb shape. Top square part seemed to have a window in it ,it looked purple inside. Had two parallel rings around it, close to its roundbody part. Looked like there was a small ring in the round part center with fourlines stemming from this center circle forming an x. Shape was like a ball witha box on top and two rings tightly around ball part. With large window in boxpart that took up the whole shape of the box part. Center was purple.
